name: Elvish
full_description: You can speak Elvish, the native tongue of the Elves

name: Common
full_description: Most commonly spoken by Humans, most races can speak this

name: Dwarvish
full_description: Commonly spoken by Dwarves

name: Giant
full_description: Commonly spoken by Giants, Ogres, Firbolgs and Goliaths

name: Gnommish
full_description: Commonly spoken by Gnomes

name: Goblin
full_description: Commonly spoken by goblin and goblinkind (Bugbears, hobgoblins, etc)

name: Halfling
full_description: Commonly spoken by Halflings

name: Orc
full_description: Commonly spoken by Orcs

name: Leonin
full_description: Therosian script, usually spoken by Leonin

name: Kraul
full_description: Commonly spoken by Kraul

name: Loxodon
full_description: Commonly spoken by Loxodons

name: Merfolk
full_description: Commonly spoken by Merfolk and other sea creatures

name: Minotaur
full_description: Commonly spoken by Minotaurs

name: Vedalken
full_description: Commonly spoken by Vedalken

name: Abyssal
full_description: Commonly spoken by Demons and Fiends

name: Aquan
full_description: Commonly spoken by Water Elementals and various water creatures. Derivative of Primordial

name: Ignan
full_description: Commonly spoken by Fire Elementals and various fiery creatures. Derivative of Primordial

name: Auran
full_description: Commonly spoken by Air Elementals and various aerial creatures. Derivative of Primordial

name: Terran
full_description: Commonly spoken by Earth Elementals and various terrian creatures. Derivative of Primordial

name: Primordial
full_description: Commonly spoken by Elementals and folk who are closely related to the Elements such as Genasi

name: Celestial
full_description: Commonly spoken by Celestials, Angelic folk and Aasimaar

name: Deep Speech
full_description: Commonly spoken by Mind Flayers, Beholders and other Abberations

name: Draconic
full_description: Commonly spoken by Dragons, Dragonborn, Kobolds and other Dragonfolk

name: Hadozee
full_description: Commonly spoken by Hadozee. It cannot be written, only spoken.

name: Infernal
full_description: Commonly spoken by Devils and other denizens of the Nine Hells

name: Kothian
full_description: Commonly spoken by Minotaurs

name: Sylvan
full_description: Commonly spoken by feyfolk and other fey creatures

name: Thri-Kreen
full_description: Commonly spoken by Thri-Kreen and other insectoids. Cannot be written, only spoken

name: Undercommon
full_description: Used as a replacement for Common but in the Underdark

name: Quori
full_description: Commonly spoken by the Quori, Kalshtar and Inspired

name: Thieves' Cant
full_description: A language made of symbols, shorthand, abbreviation and slang to communicate between thieves and other shady characters
